hero.headline: Your Complete Home Buying Guide
hero.subline: Everything you need to know about buying a home in Westchester County — from pre-approval to closing.

steps.title: Get Pre-Approved
steps.description: Before you start shopping, know your budget. I'll connect you with trusted local lenders.

steps.title: Define Your Criteria
steps.description: Neighborhood, school district, property type, must-haves vs nice-to-haves.

steps.title: Start the Search
steps.description: Curated MLS listings plus off-market opportunities through my network.

steps.title: Tour Properties
steps.description: I'll guide you through every showing with expert eyes on condition, value, and potential.

steps.title: Make an Offer
steps.description: Strategic pricing, competitive terms, and protective contingencies.

steps.title: Home Inspection
steps.description: I'll recommend trusted inspectors and guide you through the report.

steps.title: Attorney Review
steps.description: Contract review and negotiation with a local real estate attorney.

topics.title: Mortgage Types Explained
topics.body: Fixed-rate, adjustable-rate, FHA, VA, jumbo — I'll help you understand which mortgage structure fits your situation and connect you with lenders who specialize in each.

topics.title: Down Payment Options
topics.body: From 3.5% FHA loans to 20% conventional — down payment requirements vary by loan type, property, and lender. I'll help you plan strategically.

topics.title: The Inspection Process
topics.body: A professional home inspection protects your investment. Learn what inspectors look for, what's negotiable, and when to walk away.

topics.title: Understanding Closing Costs
topics.body: Expect 2-5% of the purchase price in closing costs. I'll break down every line item so nothing surprises you at the table.

topics.title: Contingencies & Protections
topics.body: Inspection, financing, and appraisal contingencies protect your deposit. I'll make sure you understand every protection in your contract.
